Home

About

Board of Directors & Staff
Board of Directors & Staff
41st District Board of Directors/Fairgrounds Staff
President:
Kara Miller
Vice President:
Richard Taylor
Directors:
Kimberley Haban
John Pritchett
Vanessa Nunes
Tony Fabricus
CEO & General Manager:
Kimberley Floyd
Exhibit Programmer:
Debbie Horner
Maintenance:
Nick Wier
IT IS OUR MISSION TO:
Produce an annual fair event to promote, encourage, and showcase the agricultural, horticultural, livestock, domestic art, mechanical and industrial products of the region. Provide for the opportunity for the citizens of Del Norte County and the Region to exhibit their products.  When ever possible, promote and provide year round facilities for use by the general public.
MEETINGS
Regular board meetings are held the 4th Tuesday of each month at 5
:00 pm in the Boardroom.
In compliance with the American Disabilities Act, if you need special assistance to participate in the meeting, please contact the Fairgrounds Office.  Notification of 48 hours prior to the meeting will enable the Fairgrounds to make reasonable arrangements to ensure accessibility to this meeting.
Please Click Here for the
BOARD AGENDA
Please Click Here for the
CALIFORNIA FORM 802
information.
In the most northern part of California, surrounded by giant Redwoods, the crystal clear Smith River, and the Pacific Ocean you will find the Del Norte County Fairgrounds.
Our year round facilities play host to a variety of special events; home shows, crafts shows, destruction derbies, concerts, car shows, dances, banquets, and livestock shows.  In addition, our facilities have been used by hundreds of couples for weddings, receptions, and anniversaries.  The Fairgrounds is also available for company parties, family reunions, and company training seminars.
No matter what type of event you are planning, the Fairgrounds is the perfect location.  We have plenty of parking and easy access off Hwy 101.  We can accommodate any size package required, indoor or out.  Plus, the  electronic message center advertises your event daily to help maximize the success of your event.
Our helpful and friendly Fairgrounds staff is pleased to provide assistance.  Whether it be assisting in laying out your event to best accommodate your needs, or recommending the many service that are available in the community.
of
Transcript
